ygData.subject: Re: Strength Issues
ygData.msgSnippet: Like all stats there appears to be a diminishing return after you hit 100. I can t really confirm this, just something I heard. Also, you don t actually do
ygData.messageBody:
Like all stats there appears to be a diminishing return after you hit 100. I
can't really confirm this, just something I heard.

Also, you don't actually do more damages, there is just a higher probabtility
that you will do Maximum damage. Next time you are fighting with your friend, see
how often you hit for the maximum damage, compared to how often he does.

Inos

erik lawrence antonsen wrote:

> From: erik lawrence antonsen <eantonse@...>
>
> Hey guys,
>
> I was curious about strength. What role does it truly play?
> Obviously you can carry more, a big plus. But what about combat? I have
> noticed that my ogre with 143 STR does the same damage as a friends high
> elf with the same weapon and much lower strength. Is this just because
> I'm am still relatively low leveled (8)? Does the str bonus take effect
> at higher levels? Or is there a bonus at all?
>
> Oogog
